package com.alonso.challengecompose

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.ExperimentalFoundationApi
import androidx.compose.foundation.Image
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Box
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.padding
import androidx.compose.foundation.pager.HorizontalPager
import androidx.compose.foundation.pager.PagerState
import androidx.compose.foundation.pager.rememberPagerState
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.material3.Scaffold
import androidx.compose.material3.Text
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.runtime.remember
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.draw.clip
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.graphicsLayer
import androidx.compose.ui.layout.ContentScale
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import coil3.compose.rememberAsyncImagePainter
import com.alonso.challengecompose.ui.theme.ChallengeComposeTheme
import kotlin.math.absoluteValue

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallengeComposeTheme {
 Scaffold(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) { innerPadding ->
 Greeting(
 name = "Android",
 modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun Greeting(name: String, modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 Text(
 text = "Hello $name!",
 modifier = modifier
 )
}

@Composable
fun Greetingq(name: String, modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 val pagerState = rememberPagerState(pageCount = { 10 })
 HorizontalPager(
 modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 state = pagerState
 ) { page ->
 Box(Modifier
 .graphicsLayer {
 val pageOffset = pagerState.calculateCurrentOffsetForPage(page)
 // translate the contents by the size of the page, to prevent the pages from sliding in from left or right and stays in the center
 translationX = pageOffset * size.width
 // apply an alpha to fade the current page in and the old page out
 alpha = 1 - pageOffset.absoluteValue
 }
 .fillMaxSize()) {
 Image(
 painter = rememberAsyncImagePainter(model = rememberRandomSampleImageUrl
 (width = 1200)),
 contentDescription = null,
 contentScale = ContentScale.Crop,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 .padding(16.dp)
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(16.dp)),
 )
 }
 }
}
@OptIn(ExperimentalFoundationApi::class)
fun PagerState.calculateCurrentOffsetForPage(page: Int): Float {
 return (currentPage - page) + currentPageOffsetFraction
}
private val rangeForRandom = (0..100000)

fun randomSampleImageUrl(
 seed: Int = rangeForRandom.random(),
 width: Int = 300,
 height: Int = width,
): String {
 return "https://picsum.photos/seed/$seed/$width/$height"
}

/**
 * Remember a URL generate by [randomSampleImageUrl].
 */
@Composable
fun rememberRandomSampleImageUrl(
 seed: Int = rangeForRandom.random(),
 width: Int = 300,
 height: Int = width,
): String = remember { randomSampleImageUrl(seed, width, height) }

@Preview(showBackground = true)
@Composable
fun GreetingPreview() {
 ChallengeComposeTheme {
 Greeting("Android")
 }
}

**Key Changes:**
1. **Fixed annotation placement**: Added `@OptIn(ExperimentalFoundationApi::class)` to the `ImagePagerScreen` composable that uses the experimental pager APIs
2. **Consistent annotation usage**: Changed the extension function to use `@ExperimentalFoundationApi` instead of `@OptIn`
3. **Cleaned up the code**: 
 - Removed the unused `Greeting` function and renamed `Greetingq` to `ImagePagerScreen`
 - Fixed formatting issues in the `rememberAsyncImagePainter` call
 - Updated the preview function accordingly

**Root Cause:** The compiler error was occurring because experimental APIs were being used without proper annotation coverage. The `HorizontalPager` and related APIs require `@OptIn(ExperimentalFoundationApi::class)` annotation on the composable function that uses them.

The code should now compile and run without the "source must not be null" exception."}]}]},"1129e364-1738-4bd8-a7b1-578c95547c06":{"id":"1129e364-1738-4bd8-a7b1-578c95547c06","name":"Truncated message conversation","timestamp":1760139828507,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallengeComposeTheme {
 Scaffold(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 containerColor = Color.Blue
 ) { innerPadding ->
 CoffeeStarBuckScree(modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding))
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalFoundationApi::class)
@Composable
fun CoffeeStarBuckScree(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val imageList = listOf(
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 )
 val pagerState = rememberPagerState { imageList.size }
 Column(
 modifier
 .defaultMinSize(minHeight = 270.dp)
 .fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 HorizontalPager(
 state = pagerState,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 pageSpacing = 5.dp,
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(horizontal = 90.dp)
 ) { page ->
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .background(Color.Transparent)
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height(250.dp)
 .graphicsLayer {
 val pageOffset =
 (pagerState.currentPage - page + pagerState.currentPageOffsetFraction).absoluteValue
 lerp(
 start = 75.dp,
 stop = 100.dp,
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 ).also { scale ->
 scaleY = scale / 100.dp
 }
 },
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Image(
 painter = painterResource(id = imageList[page]),
 contentDescription = "",
 modifier = Modifier
 .height(300.dp)
 .width(160.dp),
 contentScale = ContentScale.Crop
 )
 }

 }
 }
}

</user_query>"},{"type":"image_url","image_url":{"url":"data:image/png;base64,"}}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"El usuario tiene un HorizontalPager y quiere que el currentPage se mueva hacia abajo (pageOffset bottom) como en la imagen de referencia que ha proporcionado. Mirando la imagen, veo que hay un efecto donde la página actual parece estar más abajo que las páginas laterales, creando un efecto de "elevación" o "hundimiento" hacia abajo.

En el código actual, el efecto está aplicado solo a `scaleY`, pero para crear el efecto de que la página actual se mueva hacia abajo, necesitamos modificar la `translationY` para que la página actual tenga un offset vertical hacia abajo.

Voy a modificar el código para agregar este efecto de translationY.","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":"Veo que quieres que la página actual se mueva hacia abajo creando un efecto similar al de la imagen de Starbucks que compartiste. Actualmente el código solo aplica un efecto de escala, pero necesitamos agregar una traslación vertical hacia abajo para la página activa.

Voy a modificar el `graphicsLayer` para incluir el efecto de `translationY`:"}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01HnDLBVdoGakwsYjmM79m8k","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/java/com/alonso/challengecompose/MainActivity.kt", "instructions": "I'm modifying the graphicsLayer in the HorizontalPager to add a translationY effect that moves the current page downward, creating a bottom offset effect like in the reference image.", "code_edit": "// ... existing code ...\n .graphicsLayer {\n val pageOffset =\n (pagerState.currentPage - page + pagerState.currentPageOffsetFraction).absoluteValue\n \n // Scale effect\n lerp(\n start = 75.dp,\n stop = 100.dp,\n fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)\n ).also { scale ->\n scaleY = scale / 100.dp\n }\n \n // Translation effect - move current page down\n translationY = lerp(\n start = 0f,\n stop = 30f, // Adjust this value to control how much the page moves down\n fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)\n )\n },\n// ... existing code ..."}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01HnDLBVdoGakwsYjmM79m8k","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Perfecto! He agregado el efecto de `translationY` que hará que la página actual se mueva hacia abajo. Los cambios incluyen:

1. **`translationY`**: Mueve la página actual 30dp hacia abajo (puedes ajustar este valor si quieres más o menos desplazamiento)
2. **Interpolación**: Usa `lerp` para hacer una transición suave entre las páginas
3. **Efecto progresivo**: Las páginas que no son la actual se mantienen en su posición original (0f), mientras que la página actual se desplaza hacia abajo

El efecto ahora será:
- **Página actual**: Escalada al 100% y movida 30dp hacia abajo
- **Páginas laterales**: Escaladas al 75% y sin desplazamiento vertical

Si quieres ajustar la intensidad del efecto, puedes modificar el valor `30f` en el `stop` del `translationY`. Un valor mayor creará un desplazamiento más pronunciado hacia abajo."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

@Composable
fun CoffeeStarBuckScree(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val imageList = listOf(
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,

 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,

 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 )
 val pagerState = rememberPagerState { imageList.size }
 Column(
 modifier
 .defaultMinSize(minHeight = 270.dp)
 .fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 HorizontalPager(
 state = pagerState,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 pageSpacing = 5.dp,
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(horizontal = 90.dp)
 ) { page ->
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .background(Color.Transparent)
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height(250.dp)
 .graphicsLayer {
 val pageOffset =
 (pagerState.currentPage - page + pagerState.currentPageOffsetFraction).absoluteValue
 lerp(
 start = 75.dp,
 stop = 100.dp,
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 ).also { scale ->
 scaleY = scale / 100.dp
 }
 translationY = lerp(
 start = 0f,
 stop = 30f,
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 )
 },
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Image(
 painter = painterResource(id = imageList[page]),
 contentDescription = "",
 modifier = Modifier
 .height(300.dp)
 .width(160.dp),
 contentScale = ContentScale.Crop
 )
 }

 }
 }
}

## **¿Por qué se cortaba la imagen?**

- El contenedor tenía altura fija de `250.dp`
- Al mover la imagen `190.dp` hacia abajo, se salía del área visible
- El `clipToBounds` implícito del contenedor cortaba la parte que se salía

## **Alternativas que puedes usar:**

Si quieres más control, también puedes:

```kotlin
// Opción 1: Usar clipToBounds = false
.graphicsLayer {
 clipToBounds = false // Permite que la imagen se salga del contenedor
}

// Opción 2: Calcular altura dinámicamente
.height((250 + maxTranslationY).dp)
```

4. **En `translationY`**: Uso la constante `maxTranslationY` en lugar del valor hardcodeado

## ✅ **Ventajas de esta implementación:**

- **Altura dinámica**: El contenedor se ajusta automáticamente según el valor de `maxTranslationY`
- **Un solo lugar para cambiar**: Solo modifica `maxTranslationY` para ajustar todo
- **No más imágenes cortadas**: El contenedor siempre será lo suficientemente alto
- **Código más limpio**: Reutilizable y fácil de mantener

val maxTranslationY = 150f // Movimiento suave

@OptIn(ExperimentalFoundationApi::class)
@Composable
fun CoffeeStarBuckScree(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val maxTranslationY = 300f // Define the maximum translation value
 val imageList = listOf(
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 )
 val pagerState = rememberPagerState { imageList.size }

 HorizontalPager(
 state = pagerState,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 pageSpacing = 5.dp,
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(horizontal = 90.dp)
 ) { page ->
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .background(Color.Red)
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height((130 + maxTranslationY).dp) // Dynamic height calculation
 .graphicsLayer {
 val pageOffset =
 (pagerState.currentPage - page + pagerState.currentPageOffsetFraction).absoluteValue
 lerp(
 start = 75.dp,
 stop = 100.dp,
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 ).also { scale ->
 scaleY = scale / 100.dp
 }
 translationY = lerp(
 start = 0f,
 stop = maxTranslationY, // Use the constant here
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 )
 },
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Image(
 painter = painterResource(id = imageList[page]),
 contentDescription = "",
 modifier = Modifier
 .height(300.dp)
 .width(160.dp),
 contentScale = ContentScale.Crop
 )
 }

 }
}

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallengeComposeTheme {
 Scaffold(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 containerColor = Color.Blue
 ) { innerPadding ->
 CoffeeStarBuckScree(modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding))
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalFoundationApi::class)
@Composable
fun CoffeeStarBuckScree(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val maxTranslationY = 450f // Increased for more downward movement
 val imageList = listOf(
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 R.drawable.coffee_starbuck,
 )
 val pagerState = rememberPagerState { imageList.size }

 HorizontalPager(
 state = pagerState,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 pageSpacing = 5.dp,
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(horizontal = 90.dp)
 ) { page ->
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .background(Color.Red)
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height((300 + maxTranslationY).dp) // Fixed: Use image height + translation
 .graphicsLayer {
 val pageOffset =
 (pagerState.currentPage - page + pagerState.currentPageOffsetFraction).absoluteValue
 lerp(
 start = 75.dp,
 stop = 120.dp,
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 ).also { scale ->
 scaleY = scale / 100.dp
 }
 translationY = lerp(
 start = 0f,
 stop = maxTranslationY, // Use the constant here
 fraction = 1f - pageOffset.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
 )
 },
 contentAlignment = Alignment.TopCenter // Changed from Center to TopCenter
 ) {
 Image(
 painter = painterResource(id = imageList[page]),
 contentDescription = "",
 modifier = Modifier
 .height(300.dp)
 .width(160.dp),
 contentScale = ContentScale.Crop
 )
 }

 }
}
